description:
If you are a busy entrepreneur or professional, chances are that you are used to marketing bursts followed by busy periods and when work slows down, you begin marketing again. Here is your chance to break the cycle and create a plan that will allow you to grow your business more consistently. This course will take you through strategies that can be easily implemented to boost your marketing. The lessons have examples and process charts that will have you energized to do your marketing in no time.

  • Understand what marketing is and how to market your small business
  • Learn to assess the time commitment and requirements to implement marketing strategies
  • Learn steps that you can take to implement strategies that will help you grow your business
  • Create marketing action plan and a marketing schedule to effectively move you forward in the process.
title: Create A Marketing Plan For Your Business in 2 Hours or Less
